title: Roast herb and garlic chicken
ingredients: ['1 lemon', '1 chicken, about 1.35 kg (3 lb), without giblets', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped parsley', '2 garlic cloves, peeled', '2 tbsp fromage frais', '150 ml (5 fl oz) dry white wine', 'salt and pepper', 'To garnish', 'lemon slices', 'sprigs of fresh coriander or parsley']
